DOC.brief_summary: Randomized, double-blind, placebo controlled trial of daily lactoferrin and lysozyme supplementation in improving environmental enteric dysfunction in Malawian children
DOC.brief_title: Lactoferrin and Lysozyme Supplementation for Environmental Enteric Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: children aged 1235 months youngest eligible child in each household severe or moderate acute malnutrition severe chronic illness children unable to drink 20 mL of dual sugar solution children in need of acute medical treatment for illness or injury at time of enrollment
